column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk Province: Seven Chinese and a Malaysian were arrested by anti-narcotics police on  January 4 2019.------Meth
column6: MDMA and marijuana were seized after a number of raids targeting the dealers.------After detention
column7: the court set up a case for sending the suspects and exhibits to the provincial court according to the procedures. ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/47203
